INDEX.title: Mobile Massage in the Comfort of Your Home
INDEX.text: Discover the power of relaxation in the comfort of your home in Berlin.

HOWWORK.title: How Does Your Massage Experience Work?

text.scheduling: 1. Appointment Scheduling: Appointments are made exclusively via WhatsApp, as I am deaf and communicate through messages. Simply send me a message to book your session.
text.preparation: 2. Preparing the Environment: I recommend keeping the room quiet and well-ventilated before my arrival to ensure a more relaxing experience.
text.arrival: 3. Masseur's Arrival: I will arrive at the scheduled time with everything needed for the massage: a professional massage table, oils, and soft music. You don't need to worry about anything!
text.initialConversation: 4. Initial Conversation: Before we begin, we will have a brief conversation to understand what you expect from the massage and what type of touch you prefer, with your well-being always in focus.
text.massage: 5. The Massage: I use techniques that promote deep relaxation, restore your energy, and create a sense of ease and calm. The goal is to renew your body and mind and provide a unique feeling of well-being.
text.closing: 6. Closing and Recommendations: After the massage, I will assist you with dressing and provide simple tips to prolong the positive effects of the session.
text.payment: 7. Payment and Goodbye: Payment can be made in cash, by card, or through Google Pay. After the session, we say goodbye, and you can start your day feeling refreshed and renewed!

text.question1: 1. What do I need to do to receive a massage at my home? Choose a quiet and comfortable space with enough room for the massage table. Schedule an appointment at a time when you can relax without rushing. Don't worry about materials – I will bring everything. Wear comfortable clothes or underwear, or if you prefer, you can remain undressed.
text.question2: 2. How can I schedule an appointment? Appointments are made exclusively via WhatsApp. Just send me a message to agree on the time and location.
text.question3: 3. I have pain or health problems. Can I get a massage? My massages are for relaxation and well-being and are not intended for medical treatment. They are suitable for healthy individuals.
text.question4: 4. Can I pay by card? Yes, you can pay in cash, by card (VISA, Mastercard, etc.), or via Google Pay.
text.question5: 5. What are your hours of operation? I am available from Monday to Friday with flexible hours. Contact me via WhatsApp to schedule an appointment.
text.communication: Communication: Before the massage, share your preferences and needs with me, such as any specific areas that need extra attention or anything that should be avoided.

ABOUTME.title: About Me
ABOUTME.text:
My name is Fahed, and I am a Portuguese-Brazilian masseur with Lebanese roots. Since 2021, I have been working as a professional masseur and completed my training in Portugal. I am passionate about using specialized and carefully applied techniques to bring relaxation and well-being.

I am orally educated deaf, which makes me particularly attentive to my clients' needs. I communicate clearly, understand some English, and am currently learning German to better serve you.

My priority is to offer personalized service that makes each session unique, relaxing, and tailored to your expectations. Treat yourself to an unforgettable wellness experience. Book your massage and recharge today!
